title: Marrow
summaries: The Marrow is a Hardmode bow that converts any type of arrow into special Bone Arrows, which is not to be confused with the visually similar Bone Arrow item. These Bone Arrows fire at higher velocities than average arrows and suffer minimal drop along their course, giving the Marrow a much straighter shot than most bows. However, while the used arrow's base damage is accounted for, the special properties of converted arrows are entirely lost. The Marrow has a base 9% critical strike chance, as opposed to the usual 4%. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is also capable of autofire. The Marrow has a 1/200 (0.5%) chance to be dropped by Skeleton Archers.

statistics.Damage: 53 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 40 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Ranged)
statistics.Sell: 54 SC
